TableContextTimeStampBeforeTable: {3428=NASCAR in IMAX® (Weekends only through December 19th and everyday the day after Christmas through New Years Eve)}
textBeforeTable: Ticket Prices Skip Long Lines with Online Ticketing Stop wasting time in line when you can purchase advance tickets for IMAX® films, Planetarium shows and traveling exhibits! Call the Detroit Science Center during regular business hours to purchase advance tickets by calling 313.577.8400 , Option 5. Showtimes NOVEMBER • DECEMBER See educator guides and resources created for IMAX, planetarium films and more! Pre/post activity guides are available to enhance your learning experience. For IMAX, Planetarium, Pre-K and Exhibit guides click HERE. Teacher Guides Experience the gripping story - full of hope, crushing disappointment, dazzlingingenuity,bravery and triumph – in Hubble, the seventh awe-inspiring film from the award-winning IMAX® Space Team. Through the power of IMAX®, Hubble will enablemovie-goers to journey through distant galaxies to explore the grandeur and mysteries of our celestial surroundings,and accompany space-walking astronauts as they attempt themost difficult and important tasks in NASA’s history.
